{"id":1002280465,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1690170328,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"27 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1002280465/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"31 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int sum = 0;\n        for (auto i : nums)\n            sum += i;\n\n        int pivot = -1;\n        int left_sum = 0;\n        for (auto i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++) {\n            if (left_sum * 2 == sum - nums[i])\n                return i;\n            left_sum += nums[i];\n        }\n        return pivot;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
